attributes.action: award a knighthood to Andy Powell.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We strongly recommend that a knighthood be awarded to Andy Powell for his services to art and poetry.  He is one of the foremost creative talents in this country today as can be seen on artistandypowell   "ms".

He is legendary on the London art scene.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
